title: Chiefs (Recognition) (No. 8) Order, 2015
content:
31st July,2015 Statutory Instruments 181
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.55 OF2015
The Chiefs Act
(Laws,Volume16,Cap.287)
The Chiefs (Recognition) (No. 8) Order, 2015
WHEREASthePresidentissatisfiedthatthepersonnamedinthe
ScheduletothisOrderisentitledtoholdtheofficespecifiedinthe
Schedule as required by subsection (2) of section three of the
ChiefsAct:
NOWTHEREFORE,inexerciseofthepowerscontainedinsection
threeoftheChiefsAct,thefollowingOrderismade:
1. ThisOrdermaybecitedastheChiefs(Recognition)(No.8) Title
Order,2015.
2. The personnamedintheSchedule is recognisedas being, Recognition
withintheareainZambiadescribedintheSchedule,theholderof ofChief
theofficespecifiedintheSchedule.
SCHEDULE
(Paragraph2)
Office Area HolderofOffice
SeniorChiefNkulaofthe Ichinga KafulaMaxwellMucheleka
BembaPeopleofChinsali
DistrictintheMuchinga
Province
